creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: blue and white cotton bedding cover; white checkered patters; small squares with lighter blue colored corners throughout design; white stitching connecting panels of cloth together
markings: on back, in bottom corner: Murray Collection label: JAP 6158
title: Dark blue-ground bedding cover (futonji) with pictorial ikat (e-gasuri) pattern of stylized persimmon flowers
